This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS upgrade should enqueue connectedCallback 
PASS upgrade should enqueue attributeChangedCallback and connectedCallback 
PASS setAttribute should enqueue attributeChangedCallback 
PASS style.color should enqueue attributeChangedCallback for style attribute 
PASS style.cssText should enqueue attributeChangedCallback for style attribute 
PASS style.setProperty/removeProperty should enqueue attributeChangedCallback for style attribute 
PASS style.cssFloat should enqueue attributeChangedCallback for style attribute 
PASS lang property setter should enqueue attributeChangedCallback for lang attribute 
PASS removeAttribute should enqueue attributeChangedCallback 
PASS attributeChangedCallback should transmit namespaces 
PASS remove should enqueue disconnectedCallback 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
